channel.title: PickaxePicker
channel.description:
ok i modded the cabbage picker a bit so that instead of getting cabbages it will go from the fally east bank to where the entrance to the mining guild is. then it goes to the left and there is a room with a crate in it an on top of the crate there is a bronze pickaxe. it respawns evrey minute or so...whatever the regular respawn time is on stuff i guess. but im having a prob. once it opens door I (see pic) it walks infront of the crate which its supposed to do. now instead of grabbing the pickaxe it trys to open door II. there is another door at the top right but i stopped the script before it tried to go for it. any ideas on how i can make it grab the pickaxe once it gets infront of the crate instead of going for the other doors? i attached my script so anyone can take a look. post it back here if you get it working :)
pic... http://xto.ath.cx/pub/PickaxeDoors.jpg
im going to play around with it a bit more tonight and ill post if i figure it out
--------------------------------------------------------------------------- UPDATE ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ok so i modded it a bit. it walks to the door, opens it and walks in front of the crate. but instead of picking up the pickaxes it walks back to the door.
i attachd my new version of i if anyone can take a look a it and tell me what to do or fix it and repost it plz
new pic... http://xto.ath.cx/pub/PickaxePath.jpg
it walks in the door and goes to 1 then it should pickup the pickaxe but instead i walks back to 2. then it just goe back and foth.
*Attachment Removed*

item.title: PickaxePicker
item.dc:creator: @xPLaR xPLaR
item.description:
@xPLaR wrote:

bah scrap this i dont even need it anymore. im going to start working on something else i can use. thanks for all the help and all. i dont know why this wont work now. it compiles fine. wehn its walking to the door it click the tile in front of th door then before it gets there it clicks the tile on the outside of the wall beside the crate, which makes it start to walk all the way around to it. but after a few secs it clicks the tile in front of the door again. so i put it in the room right in front of the crate and it just sat there and didnt get any pickaxes. my last attempt is attached

Read full topic

item.title: PickaxePicker
item.dc:creator: @Stinky_Keys Stinky Keys
item.description:
@Stinky_Keys wrote:

Oh, okay, well, i’m about 95% sure that is going to be a ground item.

Read full topic

item.title: PickaxePicker
item.dc:creator: @zappacky zappacky
item.description:
@zappacky wrote:

its on top of the crate, see the piccy

Read full topic

item.title: PickaxePicker
item.dc:creator: @Stinky_Keys Stinky Keys
item.description:
@Stinky_Keys wrote:

I’m pretty sure even though its on the crate, its still a GroundItem. You should look for the pickaxe as an item and use takeItem instead of finding it as an object and useing atobject.

Do you have to search the crate, or do you just pick up the item off the top of the crate?

Read full topic

item.title: PickaxePicker
item.dc:creator: @xPLaR xPLaR
item.description:
@xPLaR wrote:

i ued the id of the item because if i use the id of the crate it will probably try to search the crate al the time. the pickaxe only respawns like once every 30 or 45 secs. i guess if i find out ow long i can make it wait that long then run the method again… thanks ill try that out

Read full topic

item.title: PickaxePicker
item.dc:creator: @zappacky zappacky
item.description:
@zappacky wrote:

ew taking an item off a crate? shudder im not sure if that is possible yet. ground items are easy, but items on things… is the id u use the id of the pix or the crate? try both.

Read full topic
